inclusion.criterion: presence of at least moderate (>10cm) pericardial effusion on CT or Echocardiography
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 3cm x 1cm mass on the lateral wall of the right atrium

exclusion.criterion: previous history of pericardial window or pericardial instillation of sclerosing therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: scheduled thoracic or cardiac surgery within the next 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: contraindications for endovascular procedure such as disseminated intravascular coagulopathy or significant ongoing bleeding tendency, and systemic septicaemia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma with a large pericardial effusion. No contraindications noted.
